DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of Losartan Potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide 100/25 mg tablet under fasted conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of Losartan Potassium/Hydrochlorothiazide 100 mg/25 mg Tablet Under Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening. Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to losartan potassium hydrochlorothiazide or any comparable or similar product.
